section.title:
sales history summarized by customer type by item
items sales history summarized by
customer types sales history summarized by Summarized Sales History by Customer Type by Item
section.para: To view summarized Sales history by Customer Type by Item, select the "Summarized Sales History by Customer Type by Item" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Summarized Sales History by Customer Type by Item

section.para: When displaying summarized Sales history by Customer Type by Item, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display summarized Sales history by Item for all Customer Types.
Specify Customer Type whose summarized Sales history by Item you want to display.
Enter a Customer Type pattern to select a range of Customer Types. Refine your search using Regular Expressions, as described in .
Summarized Sales history by Customer Type by Item generated on or after this date will be displayed.
Summarized Sales history by Customer Type by Item generated on or before this date will be displayed.
Select to display summarized Sales history by Customer Type by Item for all Warehouses.
Specify Warehouse whose summarized Sales history by Customer Type by Item you want to display.
Display lists summarized Sales history by Customer Type by Item, using the specified parameters.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Select to generate the display, using the specified parameters.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
